channel.title: Profiteering on @recursivewit

item.title: Music And Youtube Call A Domestic
item.description:
As streaming music becomes the norm, YouTube has managed to scoop up enormous gains in its music traffic. In the music industry video streams surpassed audio streams growth of 82%, yet only increased revenues by 0.4% in the same time period. And they thought people downloading music was ripping them off.

  • story: BBC News
